001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage;
002
003
004import java.util.Map;
005
006/**
007 * Provides utility methods for creating {@link DataExtractor} instances that retrieve
008 * static test data from the framework's storage.
009 *
010 * <p>This class focuses on accessing and returning values from the static test data map,
011 * allowing tests to dynamically fetch pre-defined data by a string key.
012 *
013 * <p>Generic Type {@code T}: the type of the data retrieved from the static test data map.
014 *
015 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
016 */
017public class DataExtractorsTest {
018
019   private DataExtractorsTest() {
020   }
021
022   /**
023    * Creates a {@link DataExtractor} for retrieving a specific value from the static test data map.
024    *
025    * <p>The returned extractor locates the static test data map within the storage and fetches
026    * the object associated with the provided key.
027    *
028    * @param key the string key identifying the data in the static test data map
029    * @param <T> the type of the data to be extracted
030    * @return a {@code DataExtractor} that retrieves the specified value from static test data
031    */
032   public static <T> DataExtractor<T> staticTestData(String key) {
033      return new DataExtractorImpl<>(
034            StorageKeysTest.STATIC_DATA,
035            raw -> {
036               Map<String, Object> staticTestData = (Map<String, Object>) raw;
037               return (T) staticTestData.get(key);
038            }
039      );
040   }
041
042}
